spells.title: Motivation
spells.description: If you have fewer Rooms than an opponent, you may build an extra Room this turn
spells.emphasis: You must declare this before any Rooms are revealed

spells.title: Giant Size
spells.description: Give one Monster Room +3 until end of turn

spells.title: Jeopardy
spells.description: All players must discard their hands, then draw one Spell card and two Room cards.

spells.title: Exhaustion
spells.description: Deal X damage to one Hero in your dungeon, where X is equal to the number of Rooms in your dungeon

spells.title: Freeze
spells.description: Choose and deactivate one Room in any dungeon.
spells.emphasis: It has no damage, treasure, or abilities until end of turn.

spells.title: Cave-In
spells.description: Destroy a Room in your dungeon. Kill any Hero in that Room.

spells.title: Zombie Attack
spells.description: Choose a dead Hero in an opponent's scorekeeping area. Send it back to the entrance of that player's dungeon. Until end of turn, it has +2

spells.title: Assassin
spells.description: Choose a Hero in an opponent's dungeon. Give that Hero +3 until end of turn.

spells.title: Teleportation
spells.description: Send a Hero in your dungeon back to the first Room of your dungeon.
spells.emphasis: It continues to move through your dungeon this turn

spells.title: Fear
spells.description: Choose a Hero in any dungeon and send it back to town.

spells.title: Kobold Strike
spells.description: No Rooms can be built this turn. Any face-down Room is returned to its owner's hand.

spells.title: Trepidation
spells.description: Choose a player with at least two more Souls than you. No Hero enters that player's dungeon this turn.
spells.emphasis: Any Heroes remain at the entrance to that dungeon

spells.title: Counterspell
spells.description: Choose a Spell card that has just been declared. Cancel the effects of that Spell card.
spells.emphasis: The cancelled Spell card is sent to the discard pile.

spells.title: Princess in Peril
spells.description: Choose one Hero in town. Place it at the entrance to your dungeon.

spells.title: Annihilator
spells.description: Give one Trap Room +3 until end of turn

spells.title: Soul Harvest
spells.description: Choose a face-down Hero in your scorekeeping area and remove it from the game. Draw two Spell cards.
